# File lib/innate/helper.rb, line 102
    def each(*names)
      names.map do |name|
        if name.class == Module
          yield(name) if block_given?
          name
        elsif mod = get(name)
          yield(mod) if block_given?
          mod
        elsif try_require(name)
          redo
        else
          raise LoadError, "Helper #{name} not found"
        end
      end
    end
